arts.sum: Roma will hope to build on the momentum of Europa League progress when Monza arrive at the Stadio Olimpico this evening. arts.ttl: Roma Lock Down Touted Youth Product with Long-Term Deal
arts.sum: Roma have taken care of one of the two pending renewals, as they have announced to have reached an agreement with Niccolò Pisilli on a new contract until 2029.
